p: Da Silva et al. [ 32] report the composition of P. aduncum stem EO from Brazil, which comprises α-pinene (7.2%), β-pinene (14.2%), limonene (8.7%), ( Z)-β-ocimene (5.5%), ( E)-β-ocimene (13.3%), linalool (11.8%), β-caryophyllene (7.6%), α-humulene (6.3%), and ( E)-nerolidol (10.6%), and the composition of a root EO, which comprises α-selinene (14.1–16.5%), geranyl 2-methylbutyrate (8.9–13.6%), bulnesol (4.6–6.1%), elemicin (4.6–5.9%), dillapiole (13.0–18.4%), and apiole (16.3–29.5%).
